[High Stakes

what_you_do: I help people get unstuck. People who worked hard to get where they are—only to find themselves feeling stuck. Trapped in what looks like success on the outside, but feels like a "gilded cage" on the inside. I also help people who are miserable at work, or burned out, or you've been laid off, or out of the workforce for a while.
who_you_serve: People who are frustrated, exhausted, or simply done with their current career situation.
social_proof: Lifetime Achievement Award, Professional Association of Resume Writers.
signature_programs: CPBS, CDBS, CICNC, CCM (Credentialed Career Master), CJSS (Certified Job Search Strategist), CCMC (Credentialed Career Management Coach), IJCTC (International Job and Career Transition Coach), CEIP (Certified Employment Interview Professional), CPRW (Certified Professional Resume Writer), G3 Certified (Get Clear, Get Found, Get Hired), MCD (Master Career Director).
audience_type: career changers, executives, entrepreneurs, international job seekers, managers & executives, mid-career professionals
business_focus: Helping people transform their careers and live a more harmonious and joyous life.
service_provided: Career Services & Products, Career Coaching, Executive / Leadership Coaching, Interview Coaching, Job Search Coaching, LinkedIn Profile, LinkedIn Strategy, Personal/Professional Branding, Professional Bio or Letter, Resume or CV
